previewArticle.title: LA Galaxy vs. Seattle Sounders | 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs Match Preview

recapArticle.title: LA Galaxy 1, Seattle Sounders 0 | MLS Cup Playoffs Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Seattle Sounders go on the road to face the Los Angeles Galaxy in the first leg of the Western Conference Championship.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Los Angeles Galaxy vs. Seattle Sounders | November 23, 2014

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: ¡Comienza la segunda semifinal de la Copa MLS! Para todos en EE.UU. y Latinoamérica: http://t.co/eQPi2Nx3vh #LAvSEA http://t.co/S8rsQ358Z8

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: CroatianSoccerReport
timelineItems.text: The West is the best. Catching a game with the boys from Los Angeles #LAGalaxy #mls http://t.co/rzfvphmm3Y

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Seattle Sounders FC. Conceded by Tommy Meyer.

timelineItems.name: Greg Maas
timelineItems.text: Short-handed Seattle must keep it tight and escape with an away-goal to have any chance #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: 1’ - Good early run forward there by Oba who takes on three, gets into the area and wins the early corner from Meyer. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Zach Scott (Seattle Sounders FC).

timelineItems.desc: Corner,  Seattle Sounders FC. Conceded by Robbie Rogers.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Jaime Penedo cleans up a corner

timelineItems.name: Rave Green City
timelineItems.text: Would love to see Dempsey get even more involved in the middle straight out. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Seattle Sounders FC. Conceded by Robbie Rogers.
Attempt blocked. Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Brad Evans.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 12' SAVE PENEDO. Gosh golly. The ball takes a deflection of Juninho and Meyer then falls to Penedo who has to make a quick stop. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Andrew Schmidt
timelineItems.text: It’ll be interesting to see, when the teams switch ends, if that AR’s still apparently miss calling corner kicks. Crowd’s upset. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is too high. Assisted by Omar González.

timelineItems.name: Francisco Reyes Villa
timelineItems.text: Best fans in the #MLS in town, so #LAGalaxy fans gotta bring the noise. Winner hosts the #MLSCupFinal #Galaxy #SeattleSounders #AngelCityBrigade #EmeraldCitySupporters #ThisIsLA @angelcitybrigade @emeraldcitysupporters

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy).
Chad Marshall (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Shirag Al-Rayes
timelineItems.text: @StubHubCenter @LAGalaxy #LAvSEA #FirstToFive http://t.co/GkAY7hZj0d

timelineItems.name: Nick Hamilton
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy fans ready today #LAGvsSEA

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: Scott is struggling with zardes pace and is trying too be more physical. watch that match-up #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: André
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy vs #SeattleSounders. #MLS Semifinals. @kicktv #soccer #losangeles

timelineItems.name: Rave Green City
timelineItems.text: It's taking our defense a bit longer than normal to regain its shape on the counters. Sigi, how do I influence the halftime talk? #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: First leg, MLS Western Conference finals. #MLS #lagalaxy #seattlesounders #soccer #america

timelineItems.name: sandra 💀
timelineItems.text: #acb121 #acbrigade #angelcitybrigade #mlsplayoffs #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Jodi Murray
timelineItems.text: HELLZ YEAH! #LAGALAXY #MLS #ThanksLD #10

timelineItems.name: #USMNT
timelineItems.text: Dempsey rabona #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: The rarity of a throw in called back in the professional game is like finding a diamond in the rough. You cherish it. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Not much so far for Landon Donovan. He's yet to really make an impact on this game as LA focuses on playing through Ishizaki. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Andrew Schmidt
timelineItems.text: Smart stop from Rogers who is somehow, once again, managing to play both ends of the field. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: "Our Heart Beats For You" - @acbrigade #LAvSEA http://t.co/snhZX2IPz3

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: For the first time ever we've been told no photos. But we caught one :) Good luck .@SoundersFC #MLSPlayoffs #lavsea http://t.co/lYK9hb1Twz

timelineItems.name: Brandon Yano
timelineItems.text: Game time #mls #lagalaxy

timelineItems.desc: DeAndre Yedlin (Seattle Sounders FC) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: DeAndre Yedlin goes into the book early in the match

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Marco Pappa (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Clint Dempsey.
Attempt saved. Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Attempt saved. Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from very close range is saved in the bottom right corner.
Match ends, LA Galaxy 1, Seattle Sounders FC 0.

timelineItems.name: Dale Coleman
timelineItems.text: Choosing to focus on what Marshall just did, and ignore what Yedlin just did. #LAvSEA #EBFG

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: FT: The #LAGalaxy grab a narrow 1-0 win. There’s everything still to play for in the second leg #LAvSEA #FirstToFive http://t.co/kgA4ouGy9M

timelineItems.name: Elmer Polanco
timelineItems.text: FINAL @LAGalaxy 1-0 @SoundersFC http://t.co/drHXyUENgK #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Carlos Quinteros Jr.
timelineItems.text: Clean sheet and a goal. Well done boys. On to the second leg. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: . @LAGalaxy_Es se lleva una apretada victoria y todo queda abierto para la vuelta: http://t.co/h5Fhp92C0b #LAvSEA http://t.co/tgwZVDCTWP

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: @LAGalaxy top @SoundersFC at home, 1-0: http://t.co/ClyElEJpGy #LAvSEA http://t.co/d1F3VDeeZ9

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: I fully expect #LAGalaxy to come out guns blazing in the 2nd leg to try and grab a quick away goal to put this thing away next week. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 10 - @Omar4Gonzalez led all players in @LAGalaxy v @SoundersFC with 10 aerial duels attempted and six won. Huge. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Fernando Fuentes
timelineItems.text: Good game boys!!!! Let's go to Seattle and finish the job!!!!! #bluewhiteandgold #acb121 #angelcitybrigade #losangelesgalaxy #lagalaxy #mlswesternconferencefinals

timelineItems.desc: The Seattle Sounders head home for the second leg after a 1-0 defeat against the LA Galaxy.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: LA Galaxy vs. Seattle Sounders | November 23, 2014

timelineItems.desc:
MLSsoccer.com's Katie Witham and Jason Saghini recap the first leg of the Western Conference Championship between the LA Galaxy and the Seattle Sounders.

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: LA Galaxy vs. Seattle Sounders Western Conference Championship Leg 1 Recap | 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Back-to-back saves on Martins and Dempsey from point blank range by #LAGalaxy's Jaime Penedo #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: #SanPenedo. Wowwww. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Brad Evans (Seattle Sounders FC).

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Penedo has been massive between the sticks for #LAGalaxy at the tail end of this season. #LAGalaxy #LAvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Landon Donovan following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Nicole Heyl
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Avi Creditor
timelineItems.text: Penedo can be an adventure, but he does some special things sometimes. Not sure how Seattle isn't ahead after that sequence. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Ex (エクスナア)
timelineItems.text: Wow what a series of events! Then they miss the wide pass to Evans I believe. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.desc:
The LA Galaxy and Seattle Sounders share their thoughts on the supporting casts of each team and which lesser known players might be the key to victory in the Western Conference Championship. 

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: Landon Donovan on Osvaldo Alonso: "I want him to play" | MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.desc:
MLSsoccer.com's Katie Witham, Andrew Wiebe and former USMNT assistant coach Jesse Marsch break down the game changers and the importance of Robbie Keane and Landon Donovan for the LA Galaxy ahead of their Western Conference Championship clash vs. the Seattle Sounders.

WATCH PART 1 HERE: http://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/13/la-galaxy-vs-seattle-sounders-preview-part-i-history-mls-cup-playoffs-presented-att

Part III: Q&A Preview, will feature answers to fan questions and a detailed preview of the series.
timelineItems.title: LA Galaxy vs. Seattle Sounders: Keane and Donovan Game Changers for LA Galaxy | MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.name: Mike McCall
timelineItems.text: Obafemi Martins runs down defenders with the ball like panthers stalk prey. #LAvSEA #Sounders

timelineItems.desc:
Landon Donovan, Obafemi Martins, Omar Gonzalez, Brad Evans, Stefan Ishizaki, Bruce Arena, and Sigi Schmid share their thoughts on the magnitude of the upcoming Western Conference Championship series between the LA Galaxy and Seattle Sounders. 

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: WATCH: Donovan, Martins and more on "Inevitable" LA vs SEA matchup | MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 43' The #LAGalaxy looking far too tentative in front of goal. They're trying to combine repeatedly rather than taking their chances. #Shoot

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.

timelineItems.text: If I'm LA I exclusively go down that left side. Pressure Yedlin already on a yellow. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Jason
timelineItems.text: Traveling fans in one section, surrounded by stewards. Love it. #MLS #playoffs #seattlesounders #lagalaxy #soccer

timelineItems.name: Dan Mayer
timelineItems.text: If Rogers keep working the left flank like that then yes, call him into the #USMNT January camp. Maybe he's Beasley's replacement. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, LA Galaxy 0, Seattle Sounders FC 0.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Five halves of playoff soccer, and @SoundersFC have yet to score a run-of-play goal. But they're sitting pretty right now. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Coach Milton
timelineItems.text:
Enjoying the game with my bro ⚽️😊
#socceropolis #futboleros #LAvSEA #FirstToFive #coachmilton #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Jason Thompson
timelineItems.text: Epic match so far 0-0. Still rooting for by boys!! #gosounders #ebfg #SEAvLAG

timelineItems.name: Andrew Schmidt
timelineItems.text: That’s not the first half result LA wanted. They’ll be in a bad spot if they can’t get a goal or two at home. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Nessa
timelineItems.text: #corner #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 2 - @LAGalaxy have outshot @SoundersFC 11-5 in the first half, but both teams have placed two shots on target thus far. Level. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Chewie
timelineItems.text: LA Campeones! #acb121 #lavssea #lagalaxy #mlscup2014 #playoff #angelcitybrigade #acb

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: HT - Teams are back on the pitch. Sounders going from right to left in the second period. My sweat level going from six to midnight. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 4 - Stefan Ishizaki created 4 chances in the first half against Seattle, more than the entire Sounders team (3). Knocking. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins LA Galaxy 0, Seattle Sounders FC 0.

timelineItems.desc:
MLSsoccer.com's Jason Saghini, Andrew Wiebe and former USMNT assistant coach Jesse Marsch answer all your questions and tweets ahead of the Western Conference Championship clash between LA Galaxy and the Seattle Sounders.

WATCH PART 1 HERE: http://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/13/la-galaxy-vs-seattle-sounders-preview-part-i-history-mls-cup-playoffs-presented-att

WATCH PART 2 HERE: Seattle Sounders Game Changers -  http://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/19/la-galaxy-vs-seattle-sounders-dempsey-and-martins-game-changers-seattle-sounders-ml

LA Galaxy Game Changers: http://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/18/la-galaxy-vs-seattle-sounders-keane-and-donovan-game-changers-la-galaxy-mls-cup-pla
timelineItems.title: LA Galaxy vs. Seattle Sounders, Part 3: Breaking down all your tweets and questions | MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.name: t○_●

timelineItems.text: Aaaaaaaand we're back for the second half! Watch live on @ESPN, obvi. #LAvSEA #FirstToFive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Obafemi Martins.

timelineItems.name: Avi Creditor
timelineItems.text: Sarvas had time to wind up and shoot inside the Seattle box. Costly defensive lapse for Sounders, well taken goal by Sarvas #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Dan Mayer
timelineItems.text: Goal Galaxy! The midfield keeps coming up big. LA has goal scorers in every position. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: Ishi giving the universal signal for "Settle Down." Unless it means something else in Swedish. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: MLS GB
timelineItems.text: Seattle didn't apply enough pressure on the ball. Need to look for a response now. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Airkeeper
timelineItems.text: Our D bent until it finally broke. Now it's time to do that to LA. #EBFG We need #awaygoals

timelineItems.desc: Landon Donovan's cross doesn't find a teammate in the box.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Landon Donovan's cross flashes across the box

timelineItems.name: Sean Steffen
timelineItems.text: The #LAGalaxy are really forcing the issue on the right. Chance creation extremely lopsided, skewing heavy down that side. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Goooooaaallll!!! @LAGalaxy take the lead. #LAvSEA https://t.co/FDVTumNQ8l

timelineItems.comment: Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Micheal Azira (Seattle Sounders FC).
Attempt missed. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Landon Donovan with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Adrian Melville
timelineItems.text: Just a matter of time for LA to score that goal. Seattle desperately needs more attacking balance behind Dempsey and Martins #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Kelsie Raunio
timelineItems.text: Let's sub in Barrett. We need someone with some fire in him on the field #dontgiveup #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Kevin Baxter
timelineItems.text: Centering pass from Donovan just a half-step too quick for a sliding Sarvas. Should be 2-0 Galaxy #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Dan Gargan preparing to come in for #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: GOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAALLLLLL MARCELO SARVAS! 1-0! #LAvSEA #FirstToFive

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Here we go. #LAvSEA http://t.co/PZvnzbhm85

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Stefan Frei makes a diving save on Gyasi Zardes' shot

timelineItems.name: Chris Hockman
timelineItems.text: Don't know what Yedlin is so upset about that could have easily been a straight red. #MLS #LAvSEA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the center of the box is just a bit too high.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Robbie Keane's strike is a bit too high

timelineItems.name: doryf
timelineItems.text: LA! GALAXY! LA! GALAXY! #lagalaxy #mls #mlsplayoffs #soccer #futbol #theworldssport #chant #chanting

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Zach Scott (Seattle Sounders FC).
Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 60' A.J. DeLaGarza walks off gingerly to be replaced by Dan Gargan. Seattle preparing to bring on Chad Barrett. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.name: Eric Parkinson
timelineItems.text: Sounders unable to string a coherent set of passes together. Can't just be due to Ozzie's absence. Ugh. #LAvSEA #Sounders #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) hits the bar with a right footed shot from outside the box from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.desc:
The LA Galaxy and Seattle Sounders share their thoughts on the upcoming Western Conference Championship and what they think it will take to advance to MLS Cup. 

Donovan on Alonso: "I want him to play": http://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/20/landon-donovan-osvaldo-alonso-i-want-him-play-mls-cup-playoffs-presented-att

Donovan and Martins on "inevitable" match-up: http://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/17/watch-donovan-martins-and-more-inevitable-la-vs-sea-match-mls-cup-playoffs-presente

On Donovan, Keane, Dempsey, Martins: "It's like they're playing a video game": http://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/18/donovan-keane-martins-and-dempsey-its-theyre-playing-video-game-mls-cup-playoffs-pr
timelineItems.title: What the LA Galaxy and Seattle Sounders think it will take to win the West | 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs

timelineItems.name: Sean Steffen
timelineItems.text: That was a clearly a yellow. A shove to stop a run on goal. Ref afraid to give it because it would be his second. #LAvSEA

timelineItems.desc:
The LA Galaxy and Seattle Sounders share what it's like to play with, and against, Landon Donovan, Robbie Keane, Obafemi Martins, and Clint Dempsey. 

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: On Donovan, Keane, Martins, and Dempsey: "It's like they're playing a video game" | MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.desc: MLSsoccer.com's Katie Witham, Andrew Wiebe and former USMNT assistant coach Jesse Marsch break down the game changers and the importance of Clint Dempsey and Obafemi Martins for the Seattle Sounders ahead of their Western Conference Championship clash vs. the LA Galaxy.
timelineItems.title: LA Galaxy vs. Seattle Sounders: Dempsey and Martins Game Changers for Seattle Sounders | MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T
